messages.message: @Nikolaos Kofinas @Kaustubh (KD) should we add this issue (mismatch between word and raw_word) to an existing ticket for provenance?
Lets create a new ticket for this (unless @Nikolaos Kofinas has a ticket already)
@Nikolaos Kofinas Would you be able to clarify how the linked ticket is related? I don't see anything that specifically mentions the substitution / mismatch issue
basically this is used when we have fr enabled . the text that we pass to the llm is different than the text that we show in the ui and thus it breaks stuff when there is a mismatch in the mapping
I also see this (at the surface level) as an investigation ticket, what do we need to do to ensure that @prateek.tenkaleâ€™s question is captured
What does "fr" mean in this case?
FR is form recognizer (the MSFT product we use to detect tables and checkboxes)
So basically when a user checks on tables + checkboxes

@Nikolaos Kofinas I might be missing this but what is the connection between FR and `word` vs `raw_word` ? What is the source for each one of these and what is the intended use for both of these? Additionally, that ticket is very generic, @Abhishek does the ticket you have address the discrepancy found here?

TLDR: A mismatch in `word` and `raw_word` is causing issues with provenance. This is observed especially in cases with special characters
